source.2fb3f645:
traces = [
    go.Histogram(
        x = rainfall_concat[Rainfall[i]].value_counts().unique(), 
        name=Rainfall[i]
    ) for i in range(len(Rainfall))
]

fig = make_subplots(rows=8, cols=3,subplot_titles=())
for i in range(len(traces)):
    fig.append_trace(
        traces[i], 
        (i // 3) + 1, 
        (i % 3) + 1
    )

fig.update_layout(
    template="plotly_white",
    height=1200
)

fig.show()
